message:
How Taking a Picture of Your Hotel Room Can Save a Child from Sex Trafficking.
The Internet is making it easier for criminals to capture victims, but thanks to new technologies, it’s also making it easier for us to stop them.

data.description: An app called Traffick Cam is now equipping travelers to join the fight to end human trafficking.
data.title: How Taking a Picture of Your Hotel Room Can Save a Child from Sex Trafficking
